channel.title: Client ddosed?
channel.description:
yesterday January 16.. my server launched... everything worked fine and we had about 10 - 20 people the first day... great server 1 terabyte of space 4gb of RAM.. top of the line... yesterday late at night a guy came in and started glitching it.. attacking npc's that could not have been attacked... and making himself invisible.. which i dunno how... after a while he stopped and went away...and everyone was enjoying there time... I went to bed and woke up this morning.. and it says error connecting to server... i tried everything, restarted it... compiled everything... no errors... I have no idea what is going on... someone please help
ohh and the name of the server is the Sith Order
i figured out what was wrong.. my ip changed.. i dunno why... its changed from 104.. to 100 help?

item.title: Client ddosed?
